snippet: Perhaps to the chagrin of cellphone carriers, signs point to a continuing decline in text messaging in several parts of the world, including Finland, Hong Kong and Australia. Is the United States next?
abstract: Perhaps to the chagrin of cellphone carriers, signs point to a continuing decline in text messaging in several parts of the world, including Finland, Hong Kong and Australia. Is the United States next?
lead_paragraph: Perhaps to the chagrin of cellphone carriers, all signs point to text messaging's continuing its decline in several parts of the world.

headline.main: Text Messaging Is in Decline in Some Countries
